price: [si Propeta Muḥammad na] isang Sugo mula kay Allāh, na bumibigkas ng mga pahinang dinalisay,
arabic: رَسُولٞ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ يَتۡلُواْ صُحُفٗا مُّطَهَّرَةٗ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: rasūlun mina al-lahi yatlū ṣuḥufan muṭahharatan
